EmailTemplate.subject: Please Take One-minute to Complete a Honeywell Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> YOUR FEEDBACK IS IMPORTANT Dear Valued GV/GIV Customer,
Please take a shortÂ one-minute survey to help Honeywell understand what is important to you. Your responses are completely anonymous. We really appreciate your input!
TAKE A SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/SJBYJW8]]>

The Honeywell Aerospace team
